name: EM Blade
description: The earliest electromagnetic Omnium project. The blade is easy to handle, and is very popular among Wanderers that are not great fighters.

normals.name: Quick Slash
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **34.6%** of ATK plus **208** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.1%** of ATK plus **181** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.4%** of ATK plus **164** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **47.9%** of ATK plus **287** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.2%** of ATK plus **433** and **launch** the target.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **15.7%** of ATK plus **94**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.3%** of ATK plus **152**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **45.1%** of ATK plus **271**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **67.4%** of ATK plus **404** and deliver a **knockdown**.

normals.name: Cyclone
normals.description:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal **22.3%** of ATK plus **134** to a single target.

normals.name: Diving Edge
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to **6.4%** of ATK plus **38** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **35.6%** of ATK plus **214** to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **256.5%** of ATK plus **1539**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Roam
skill.description: Roam between targets, dealing total damage equal to **227.1%** of ATK plus **1362** to up to **5** targets, with the last hit suspending the target. Immune to hitstun while active. Reduce damage dealt to the same target by **40%** each time. **10**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Unbridled Flurry
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, then rush to the target and **strongly suspend** them, dealing damage equal to **266.6%** of ATK plus **1599**.
